name: Emergency Medicine Services of Fl, LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Emergency Medicine Services of Fl, LLC is a Emergency Medicine provider based in Aventura, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $37.6M in Medicaid payments across 908K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $37.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
